title: i really hate how bot lane and single handedly fuck my games up
body:
especially when 9 times out of 10 (i really wish i was exaggerating) im always stuck with the adc who plays like dirt.
riot please stop making games so one sided and determined by who gave first blood

replies.body: You could roam down and help.
except for if i do that my tower would probably get destroyed while im gone because their made out of wet toilet paper
Then push your lane, and then roam. Takes them at least a minute 30 to 50 seconds to touch your turret.
